articles.title: Former cricketer Ambati Rayudu joins YSRCP in Andhra CM's presence - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Reddy welcomed Rayudu by putting a YSRCP scarf around his neck and embracing him.
articles.content: Ambati Tirupati Rayudu with Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Y S Jagan Mohan Reddy. Credit: X/@YSJaganTrends Amaravati: Former Indian cricketer Ambati Rayudu on Thursday joined the ruling YSRCP in Andhra Pradesh. He was inducted into the party in the pr...

articles.author: Matthew Sullivan
articles.title: Image is everything wrong with Test cricket
articles.content:
It’s just not Test cricket.
Legends of the game couldn’t believe their eyes when play stopped on Day 3 of the Boxing Day Test between Australia and Pakistan for a bizarre reason.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
